DOC.brief_title: Intramuscular Injections Degarelix Administered 1-Month Dosing Regimens Patients With Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Has histologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate , endocrine therapy indicate Has current tumour , nodule metastasis ( TNM ) stag within 12 week prior treatment start , clinically indicate bone scan Has PSA level meet one criterion : 1 . For treatmentnaïve patient : Screening PSA level ≥2 ng/mL . 2 . For patient recurrence radical prostatectomy : Patients serum PSA increase ≥0.2 ng/mL previous test two consecutive measurement 3 . For patient recurrence radiotherapy cryotherapy : Patients serum PSA ( two measurement ) > 2 ng/mL high previously confirm PSA nadir Has screening serum testosterone level lower limit normal range elderly male population , globally define > 150 ng/dL Has Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group score ≤2 Has life expectancy least one year Has previous currently hormonal management prostate cancer Is consider candidate curative therapy i.e . radical prostatectomy radiotherapy trial period Has history bilateral orchiectomy , adrenalectomy , hypophysectomy Has mark baseline prolongation QT/QTcF interval ( e.g . repeat demonstration QTcF interval > 450 m ) Has history risk factor Torsade de Pointes ventricular arrhythmia ( e.g . heart failure , hypokalemia , family history Long QT Syndrome ) Has previous history presence another malignancy , prostate Currently receive chronic treatment intramuscular medication inject ventrogluteal dorsogluteal muscle Has receive investigational drug within last 28 day precede Screening Visit longer consider possibly influence outcome current trial
